explanation.label: Explain
explanation.dialog-content:
Here you can see all the reactions to your questions and comments, for example, whether you received a star, whether your question was answered, commented, banned or deleted.

With a click on the message you get to your question.

message.question-change_ack: has changed moderation status of your question.
message.question-change_favorite: has changed the bonus of your question.
message.question-change_correct: has changed the correctness of your question.
message.question-change_tag: has changed the category of your question.
message.question-change_score: has changed the category of your question.
message.question-answered: has marked your question as answered.
message.comment-change_score: has changed the score of your comment.
message.comment-change_correct: has changed the correctness of your comment.
message.comment-change_favorite: has changed the bonus of your comment.
message.comment-change_tag: has changed the category of your comment.
message.comment-change_ack: has changed moderation status of your comment.
message.comment-answered: has marked your comment as answered.

delete-notifications.message: Do you really want to delete all notifications?
